about_the_game:
Finding Hannah is a relaxing puzzle game about a woman navigating an early midlife crisis.

Hannah’s got it all: a well-paying job, a fancy coffee machine, and a comfortable life – so why isn’t she happy? Lead her on a journey of self-discovery as you explore beautiful scenes, find hidden objects, and merge items in this heartfelt family drama.

🔍 A GAME OF OBSERVATION & MEMORY

Search each handcrafted scene to find all the hidden objects. Play at a laid-back pace, finding objects as you go, or master each location to improve your score.

🔍 GENERATIONAL STORY

Hannah is a woman searching for answers. She turns to her grandmother, Eva, and her mother, Sigrid, to find that each of them has her own unique story to tell.


🔍 CATCHY SOUNDTRACK

Each level features an original, danceable music track that will make you want to move.

🔍 CHARMING & DIVERSE CAST

Get to know a lively cast of characters across three time periods in Berlin.

🔍 PUZZLING GAMEPLAY

Each scene has multiple modes! Can you identify objects only using their silhouettes, or find all of the chess pieces as quickly as you can?

🔍 MERGE & UPGRADE

Earn coffee, self-care goodies, and sweet treats by completing levels, then merge them to get better and better items! Unlock new scenes by fulfilling each order at your own pace.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 4.0, Mesa 12, X11 7 (or above)
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Finding Hannah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Finding Hannah is a relaxing puzzle game about a woman navigating a midlife crisis. Hannah’s got it all: a well-paying job, a fancy coffee machine, and a comfortable life – so why isn’t she happy? Lead her on a journey of self-discovery as you explore beautiful scenes and find hidden objects.
